review: Love the stick and the fact that I can carry it when traveling so I can use it in hotels that require passwords on Wi-FI
author: john in jax

review: Content streams perfectly, little to no buffering, no connectivity issues with my wifi, setup and watching a show in less than 15 mins. Remote works perfectly. Will be purchasing another for a second TV. Love, love, LOVE it!
author: victoria

review: It is working great,  we love it so far so good. Sling tv has some performance issues but overall everything else has met or exceeded our expectations.
author: Johnny Bunch

review: I bought this for traveling. It works for all HDMI TV hotel internet setups, even the password portal types. Once you choose the hotel wifi, it pauses for a minute or 2 as if it wont connect...then the hotel login screen opens with no problem. Works great. A must have.
author: Adam Lomax

review: May I first day, I was very excited for this product.  Unfortunately, it has continually froze while watching Hulu, Netflix, and Sling TV.  Additionally, it disconnects from the Internet fairly regularly.  We upgraded our internet to 50 Mbps, and it still froze.  When we watch on our Wii, it never freezes.  I contacted customer service, and it didn't help.  It was a waste of an hour, while the lady had me reset and unplug every device.  I recommend selecting another product.
author: Kyle Lindey

review: I love my fire stick. Easy to install. Battery was the only hard part. So many choices of what to watch, especially with the prime membership. Love it!
author: Nichole

review: We Love our Fire TV Stick.  We brought it to the marina where we keep our sailboat, and had no problem using it.  Since I was bragging about all of the prime movies we could watch, my friend purchased one as well.  Actually, my sister also bought one.  The fire stick turns your tv into a smart-tv without the price. I'm glad we finally purchased one.
author: Trish

review: This device has a lot of nice features, but it is missing a basic feature that has my wife hating it. Wouldn't be much of a problem, but then I hear about it...constantly...which is a problem.  This device will not stretch the image to fill the television screen.  Watch something produced for the square televisions, and you have black stripes all the way around.
author: MC

review: Love using the kindle fire stick you can easily move it from television to television. If I had any questions they were answered right away by using the help button on my kindle fire.
author: beverly wall

review: I love the parental controls and having the convenience of my television channels.  Great product!
author: applejack
